gogolib.jar is a Java library used to work with GoGo Board.
Currentyl it cannot work with local connected GoGo Board.
It can only communicate with GoGo Server embeded in GoGo Monitor through socket.

Make sure you have the latest GoGo Monitor
http://www.gogoboard.org/download

This jar file can also be used as a standalone Java application
it can be started by command:
    java -jar gogolib.jar
    java -jar gogolib.jar ip-address port-number

You can find documentation and other files of this library at
http://code.google.com/p/gogolib4java/downloads/list
